column1: Little Goat Diner////I was really pumped to try something new and nothing was really jumping out at me from the menu
column2: so I order the chicken and French toast. What did I eat? It had a bizzare mix of flavors that did not compliment each other. The egg was fried into the toast
column4: but I found a fairy large eggshell
column6: in my meal. Usually I would say something
column7: but I barely finished my dish because I was put off by the flavor combo. The waitress was the best
column10: passionate about the menu and restaurant.
